Row.Text: [ICON_Bullet]Unique [ICON_Religion] Religious Unit of the [ICON_Governor] Void Singers Secret Society, with [ICON_Ability] Support Abilities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Dying or using all [ICON_Charges] Charges grants a [ICON_GreatWork_Relic] Relic.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Can use a [ICON_Charges] Charge to lower enemy City Loyalty.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique [ICON_Unit] Unit from the [ICON_Governor] Sanguine Pact Secret Society, with [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength and combat abilities.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Has [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength equal to the strongest [ICON_Unit] Unit the player has produced.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when adjacent enemy [ICON_Unit] Units die; capped at +10 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from [ICON_Barbarian] Barbarians.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Cannot be killed and retreats to the [ICON_Capital] Capital or [ICON_Charges] Vampire Castle when defeated.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Reduced healing per turn; +50 Healing from [ICON_Pillaged] Pillaging.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to the [ICON_Governor] Sanguine Pact Secret Society and the [ICON_Unit] Vampire.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Occupying [ICON_Unit] Unit gains +4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength and 2 turn of [ICON_Fortified] Fortification.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Duplicates yields of adjacent tiles from the turn the [ICON_Charges] Improvement was built; bonus yields are also added to the [ICON_Capital] Capital.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to [ICON_Governor] Void Singers Secret Society, replaces the [ICON_Buildings] Monument; any other [ICON_Buildings] Monument Replacements are replaced by this Building.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet] 1 [ICON_GreatWork_Landscape] Great Work slot.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +4 [ICON_Faith] Faith; +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture if the City is at maximum Loyalty.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 Loyalty per turn in City.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to [ICON_Governor] Hermetic Order Secret Society, replaces the [ICON_Buildings] University; any other [ICON_Buildings] University Replacements are replaced by this Building.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_Gold] Gold equal to the [ICON_District] District adjacency.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Housing] Housing, +2 [ICON_Production] Production, and +4 [ICON_Science] Science.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Citizen] Citizen slot.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant and [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points per turn.

[ICON_Bullet]Unique to [ICON_Governor] Gilded Vault Secret Society, replaces the [ICON_Buildings] Bank; any other [ICON_Buildings] Bank Replacements are replaced by this Building.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route if the City has a [ICON_DISTRICT_HARBOR] Harbor.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]Gain [ICON_Culture] Culture equal to the [ICON_District] District adjacency.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+5 [ICON_Gold] Gold.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Citizen] Citizen slot.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+2 [ICON_GreatMerchant] Great Merchant points per turn.
